latest_revision.text:
General guidelines on how to get the best engraving results.  Overall, I'm really unqualified to give you help here, but this is where I'll document as I learn.

= Clear Acrylic =
The trick here is to mirror your engrave.  You want to be engraving on the "backside" of the acrylic because it looks better.  As a result, you'll need to use the "mirror" when you go to engrave.  Create your design as you want to see it, and then just do it in software at the end.

= Other Materials =
Document some stuff here.
